ygData.msgSnippet: Not at all,hehe..I rather like all the information thats been pumping up for the past few days :) Though I would like to know if there are players here that
ygData.messageBody:
Not at all,hehe..I rather like all the information thats been pumping up for the past few days :) Though I would like to know if there are players here that actually ROLE-PLAY their characters meaning

1.I would never see a DarkElf cleric curing an elf :)
2.An orge getting killed for a damsel in distress
3.Some dwarf that said someone called him on his mobile phone

I would love to see ppl doing that :)

Apology note

Firstly, I'd like to apologise for my whining and sarcasm and ranting and semi-flooding of the EQ-Mail List.

Secondly, you guys might have to put up with it hehehe....cos' I get excited when it comes to conversing about EQ.

God Bless,
